# SingleStoreBulkLoader.SourceStream property

A Stream containing the data to load. Either this or [`FileName`](./FileName.md) must be set. The [`Local`](./Local.md) property must be `true` if this is set.

```csharp
public Stream? SourceStream { get; set; }
```
